body.name: Google Pixel 6 – 5G Android Phone - Unlocked Smartphone with Wide and Ultrawide Lens - 128GB - Stormy Black (Renewed)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 6.4" AMOLED, 90Hz, HDR10+, 1080 x 2220 pixels, 20:9 ratio, Android 12, 4614mAh Battery, Includes: Phone, Data Transfer Dongle, USB Cable. Does NOT contain Charger Cube
128GB ROM, 8GB RAM, Octa-core, Google Tensor (5 nm), Mali-G78 MP20
Rear Camera: 50MP, f/1.9 + 12MP, f/2.2, Front Camera: 8MP, f/2.0, Under Display Fingerprint, Bluetooth 5.2

US model. Unlocked for freedom to choose your carrier. Compatible with both GSM & CDMA networks. The phone is unlocked to work with all GSM Carriers & CDMA Carriers Including AT&T, T-Mobile, Verizon, Sprint., Etc.
body.description: Meet Pixel 6. It’s completely reimagined, inside and out. Powered by Tensor, Google’s first-ever processor, it’s fast, smart, and secure. The all-day battery adapts to you. The Pixel Camera captures a moment just how you experienced it. And the Personal Safety app and the new Titan M2TM chip help protect you, your stuff, and your privacy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Pixel 6 is a great phone.
reviews.reviewText: I love this phone. I received what I ordered from this company with no issues and I would definitely use them again. This phone was unlocked and it easily connected to my Verizon account.I have always been an android user and this is my second pixel phone, I don't have anything bad to say about it. The battery life easily gets me through a day and I watch videos and I am on it all the time. The recharge rate is slower than other phones but make sure you plug it in at night while you are sleeping and there is never an issue. I have even went two days without charging although half way through the second day, I did have to watch my use until I got back home.The phone is sleek, stylish, and easy to use. Google makes great phones. I haven't experienced any lag or any issues while texting, talking, or surfing the web. The memory is more than enough for me but I do know you can get them with more memory if needed. The updates are supposed to go well into 2028 (with the pixel 6) so you don't have to worry about that part being outdated. The phone is well built and I love it. I will stay with pixel phones in the future, every one I have had, has been a great phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished but as brand new
reviews.reviewText: This pixel 6 works perfectly. Smooth, fast, beautiful, excellent pictures, better than the ones of my already excellent Galaxy s21 ultra. Android 14 already installed.Condition is: Perfect. Not a scratch, not a spec of dust!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with my Pixel 6, and having the option to get one Renewed for the price of a cheap TracFone is great!I ordered one in "Good Condition" and received exactly that. The only defects I have noticed are a few super tiny scratches on the bottom back glass and a little on the metal surrounding the camera visor. Otherwise; it is scratch free and even came with a screen protector.The phones performance is great. It is incredibly fast and has some groundbreaking smart "AI" features. Features such as "Now Playing" to keep a record of all songs that have played around you, automatic call screening, incredibly fast dictation, adaptive charging, and the camera is fantastic (Although it does seem like there is something under the lenses that flares when taking pictures at night).The battery life and finger print scanner are my two complaints. The battery is acceptable, but 6 to 7 hours of SOT is pretty bad for a modern phone. The finger print scanner is slow and often doesn't recognize my thumb.Overall; this is a much better option than any midrange device on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Google Pixel 6 Smartphone
reviews.reviewText: The phone works great. All functions and settings. The only negative shade I can cast on the device is the battery. Although I've been using it a lot since I first got it, the thing is in battery saver mode (auto on at 20%) from 100% charge pretty quick. Google says it will improve with software updates that come every month or so. We'll see about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bottom line: Great phone with new car smell
reviews.reviewText: I am on a budget and opted for the Pixel 6 after researching many phones. I upgrade my phones every 2-3 years and the 8Gb of ram is what tipped the scale for me. My carrier only certified 4 brands on it's roaming network: Samsung, Apple, Google Pixels and Motorola. The listing mentioned it was a 9/10 but when I opened the box it had that new car smell and looked like it was never used so super happy on that front along with its super low price compared to other vendors on Amazon and other e-tailers. The phone is super fast and responsive when it comes to notifications like Ring and smart home functions. This phone pleasantly surprises me daily as I am still getting to know its features. My previous phone had dual sim slots which one of them was used with a 64GB memory card. This Pixel 6 has 128Gb of storage space with 1 sim slot so I can say goodbye to my memory card. The size of the phone fits just right in my hand. Watching content on the screen is great and the the audio is very good as well. Battery life is impressive and it does take a bit longer to charge than my previous phone but that's only because the battery capacity is larger. I've had the phone for 2+ weeks and have no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good battery life, big screen, good deal
reviews.reviewText: having to unlearn IOS again, but moving forward. Great moderate priced phone. Does all I need it to, and when it doesn't I find out how it does!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Deep scratches in screen
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this 'reconditioned' phone because my Pixel4 unexpectedly died.I was pleased that it arrived next day.I was disappointed when I removed the cheap thin protector film and found the screen to have several deep scratches in it.I was initially inclined to return the phone since I have good luck with reconditioned devices in the past, but ultimately decided it was not worth the hassle of return.The phone seems functional so far, and I have not yet noticed any connectivity issues as others have mentioned about the Pixel 6.Had the screen not been scratched, this would have been 5 stars.It lost 1 star for the screen being scratched.It lost a second for negligence of the packager to flag the scratches, and instead try to hide it with a cheap film protector.

Lo he probado para corroborar que todo le funciona, camaras, sensores, recepcion movi con telcel, por ahora todo esta como si de un celular nuevo se tratase. En cuanto a aspecto fisico, algunos ligeros arañazos en la parte superior de las camaras traseras, donde el celular cambia de color, pero nada que manche la experiencia. Los marcos me dejaron asombrado, no tienen ni una sola abolladura (que es lo mas normal en equipos reacondicionados), la pantalla me llego como nueva, sospecho que esta es la parte restaurada del terminal, ya que tiene ligeras manchas blancas en la union de la pantalla con el cuerpo del celular, propias del pegamento que se les pone a las pantallas reparadas, lo veo de manera positiva ya que casi no se notan dichas manchas y obtuve una pantalla sin los comunes arañazos que se crean al guardar tu celular en un bolsillo del pantalon. El envio tarda en iniciar, asi que si lo pides ten paciencia, pues los primeros dias (en mi caso 3) ni siquiera empezara el envio. El tiempo que tardo en llegar a mi casa despues de partir fue de 5 dias, un sabado.En general una muy buena experiencia, segun parece es un juego de azar el que te llegue un producto practicamente inservible o un celular en perfecto estado, yo creo que vale la pena el riesgo.

Really good phone, for the price its hard to beat. My screen resolution seems to be less brighter than i thought but the phone is great. Great value for the price point i would buy another one without hesitating
Llegó en buenas condiciones, funciona perfectamente y no he notado ningún defecto.
Zero visible scratches,looks new, screen and battery seem to be operating as they should.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto y definitivamente no woy un bot
reviews.reviewText: Compre el telefono y viene de lujo. Su sistema es lo mas fluido y como de usar. cuando abri el producto venia en una caja de amazon con un cargador basico. Pero el punto importante que era el telefono esta impecable. No tenia bateria, admito que eso me asusto pero al cargarlo lo configure y estaba eatupendo.Definitivamente una muy buena compra
